content.description: <math alttext="2 H 2 gas plus 2 N O gas react to produce N 2 gas plus 2 H 2 O gas " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: For the chemical reaction represented above, the following mechanism is proposed.Step 1: <math alttext="2 N O gas is in equilibrium with N 2 O 2 gas " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>⇌</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> (fast equilibrium) Step 2: <math alttext="N 2 O 2 gas plus H 2 gas react to produce N 2 O gas plus H 2 O gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> (slow) Step 3: <math alttext="N 2 O gas plus H 2 gas react to produce N 2 gas plus H 2 O gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> (fast) Which of the following initial rate law expressions is consistent with this proposed mechanism?

choices.label: <math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H 2, squared times the molar concentration of N O squared" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>Rate</mtext> <mo>=</mo> <mi>k</mi> <msup> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>[H</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mo>]</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msup> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>[NO]</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of N O squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mtext>Rate</mtext><mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mtext>[NO]</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H 2, times the molar concentration N O squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mtext>Rate</mtext><mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H 2, times the molar concentration of N 2 O squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H 2, times the molar concentration N O squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mtext>Rate</mtext><mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
